featured.text: Hundreds of ships sailing the Spice Route docked here, bringing spices and goods for transaction, and Zanzibar became one of the biggest trading centers in the world.

definition.zh_def: 交易；商業活動中涉及金錢或物品的交換。
definition.en_def: A transaction is an instance of buying or selling something, or the process of conducting business.
definition.example: She completed the transaction at the bank to transfer money to her savings account.
